articles.author: ABC News
articles.title: Serbia's EuroPride will not happen due to threats, says President - ABC News
articles.description: The Serbian President announced the pan-European pride event will not take place in Belgrade this year, citing threats.
articles.content:
Serbia will not allow a pan-European LGBTQ Pride event to take place in Belgrade next month, the President has said, citing threats from right-wing extremists and fears of clashes.

articles.author: Hayden Vernon
articles.title: Dinosaur remains found in Portuguese back garden could be Europe's largest ever find - The Irish Times
articles.description: Palaeontologists have begun unearthing the vertebrae and ribs of what they think is a brachiosaurid sauropod
articles.content:
The remains of what could be the largest dinosaur ever found in Europe have been uncovered in a back garden in Portugal.

articles.title: Powerful solar flare lashes Earth, causes radio blackout across Europe and Africa - Livescience.com
articles.description: Auroras have been swirling through the skies already this week as the sun awakens from slumber.
articles.content:
Punches from the sun are overpowering skywatchers these days.
